summary: Client requested Sarah set up a vision meeting. The PM asked for a project name; architect, developer, and QA gave no comments (not addressed).

backlog_deltas.title: Add vision meeting and project-naming task to backlog

risks.risk: No project name defined may delay alignment and planning
risks.mitigation: Include project-naming as an agenda item for the vision meeting or have the PM assign and confirm a project name before the next milestone
